issue.message: Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "callable", in androidx.room.guava.GuavaRoom.createListenableFuture) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 2, "callable", in androidx.room.guava.GuavaRoom.createListenableFuture) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Unknown nullability; explicitly declare as `@Nullable` or `@NonNull` to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://developer.android.com/kotlin/interop#nullability_annotations
